title: Visit by Axelle Lemaire to the Consumer Electronics Show (CES), Las Vegas - Thursday 5 January to Friday 6 January 2017
text:
AXELLE LEMAIRE 
MINISTER OF STATE REPORTING TO THE MINISTER FOR THE ECONOMY AND FINANCE, WITH 
RESPONSIBILITY FOR DIGITAL AFFAIRS AND INNOVATION 
 
N o t e  f o r  e d i t o r s  
N o t e  f o r  e d i t o r s  
www.economie.gouv.fr 
  Paris, 29 December 2016 
No. 072 
Visit by Axelle Lemaire to the  
Consumer Electronics Show (CES), Las Vegas 
 
Thursday 5 January to Friday 6 January 2017 
 
 
Axelle Lemaire, Minister of State with responsibility for Digital Affairs and Innovation, will visit the 
2017 Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas on 5 and 6 January 2017. CES is the number one 
B2B trade show for product launches, for making a name on the US market and for meeting 
distributors and investors from around the world. In just a few days, companies present at CES 
come into contact with key stakeholders who can help them boost their development plans.  
 
French Tech was the surprise hit of the previous two editions of CES, and this year it is retaining its 
position. With 238 exhibitor companies, France is the third largest delegation. At Eureka Park, it 
will lead the pack, with 36% of start-ups, ahead of the US, Israel, South Korea and even China. 
 
 
Provisional schedule: 
 
Thursday 5 January 
 
8–9.30am: 
Working breakfast with French Tech Hub ambassadors and Michel Sapin, 
Minister for the Economy and Finance 
 
9.45–10.30am: 
CES opening ceremony and ribbon-cutting, in the presence of Michel Sapin 
 
10.30am–12.30pm: Visit to French Tech pavilion with Business France, followed by a further visit 
to stands of French start-ups, in the presence of Michel Sapin 
 
2.45–3.30pm:  
Speeches by Michel Sapin and Axelle Lemaire to French Tech ambassadors 
and American decision-makers on France as a place to do business 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
4–5.30pm: 
Visit to stands of French SMEs, mid-tier firms and major companies, in the 
presence of Michel Sapin  
 
5.45–7pm: 
“Meet the Minister”: meetings with French start-ups 
 
7–8pm: 
Cocktail reception organised by MEDEF and the French Digital Industries 
Alliance (AFNUM) – Speech by Axelle Lemaire 
 
8.30–10pm: 
French Founders evening gala  
 
 
 
Friday 6 January 
 
 
8.30–9.30am:  
Discussions with French media 
 
10–10.45AM:  
TechCrunch Panel 
 
11–11.30am: 
Press conference with international media  
 
  
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Media contacts: 
 
Axelle Lemaire's Private Office: +33 1 53 18 44 50 sec.senum-presse@cabinets.finances.gouv.fr
